page.title: 14Walmer Castle
page.content:
Walmer Castle is very interesting. It was built for{Henry VIII}in 1540 although he never lived in it. The {Duke of Dorset}was made the first Lord Warden in 1705 and he made it into a home.{William Pitt}brought the cannons in 1708 but they are only fired in salutation.
There have been 23 Lord Wardens including{Sir Winston Churchill. {HRH The Queen Mother}is the present Lord Warden.
The area around the castle includes five acres of pleasant gardens.
Walmer Castle gets a few thousand visitors a year. Many of these are foreigners, especially students from France and other European countries.
